item.title: Notebook: When Families Grieve
item.description: One in 20 children under the age of 15 will experience the death of a parent. Katie Couric comments on a special resource for families in their time of need.
item.itunes:subtitle: One in 20 children under the age of 15 will experience the death of a parent. Katie Couric comments on a special resource for families in their time of need.
item.itunes:summary: One in 20 children under the age of 15 will experience the death of a parent. Katie Couric comments on a special resource for families in their time of need.
item.itunes:keywords: News

item.itunes:keywords: CBS News, couric, cbs, katie, evening news, video, face the nation, 48 hours
item.title: Notebook: Jerald terHorst Remembered
item.description: Katie Couric remembers the life of the recently deceased Jerald terHorst who served as the first U.S. Press Secretary under Gerald Ford.
item.itunes:subtitle: Katie Couric remembers the life of the recently deceased Jerald terHorst who served as the first U.S. Press Secretary under Gerald Ford.
item.itunes:summary: Katie Couric remembers the life of the recently deceased Jerald terHorst who served as the first U.S. Press Secretary under Gerald Ford.
item.itunes:keywords: News

item.title: Notebook: April Fools' Day
item.description: Katie Couric comments on the possible origin of April Fools' Day and how to take a prank with a grain of salt.
item.itunes:subtitle: Katie Couric comments on the possible origin of April Fools' Day and how to take a prank with a grain of salt.

item.title: Notebook: Movie Futures
item.description: Wall Street trading firm Cantor Fitzgerald is one of two companies planning to open futures markets for movie releases where investors would bet on potential blockbusters and box office busts. Katie Couric reports.
item.itunes:subtitle: Wall Street trading firm Cantor Fitzgerald is one of two companies planning to open futures markets for movie releases where investors would bet on potential blockbusters and box office busts. Katie Couric reports.

item.itunes:keywords: News

item.itunes:keywords: CBS News, couric, cbs, katie, evening news, video, face the nation, 48 hours
item.title: Notebook: Dancing Babies
item.description: Researchers from England and Finland studied the dance moves of 120 babies between the ages of 5 months and 2 years. Katie Couric comments that a dancing baby is a happy one.
item.itunes:subtitle: Researchers from England and Finland studied the dance moves of 120 babies between the ages of 5 months and 2 years. Katie Couric comments that a dancing baby is a happy one.

item.itunes:keywords: CBS News, couric, cbs, katie, evening news, video, face the nation, 48 hours
item.title: Notebook: Pepper Problem
item.description: Spices can add lots of flavor to dishes, but Katie Couric notes that seasonings, such as pepper, can carry a risk of exposure to salmonella. Hundreds of people have already been affected nationwide.
item.itunes:subtitle: Spices can add lots of flavor to dishes, but Katie Couric notes that seasonings, such as pepper, can carry a risk of exposure to salmonella. Hundreds of people have already been affected nationwide.

item.itunes:keywords: News

item.itunes:keywords: CBS News, couric, cbs, katie, evening news, video, face the nation, 48 hours
item.title: Notebook: Unplug?
item.description: A nonprofit group called Reboot has declared a National Day of Unplugging beginning tomorrow, March 19th, 2010, at sunset. Katie Couric comments on putting down that BlackBerry, turning off the computer and getting outside.
item.itunes:subtitle: A nonprofit group called Reboot has declared a National Day of Unplugging beginning tomorrow, March 19th, 2010, at sunset. Katie Couric comments on putting down that BlackBerry, turning off the computer and getting outside.

item.title: Notebook: Corey Haim
item.description: Corey Haim's untimely death followed the all too familiar arc of childhood star turned addict. Katie Couric comments.
item.itunes:subtitle: Corey Haim's untimely death followed the all too familiar arc of childhood star turned addict. Katie Couric comments.

item.title: Notebook: Online Haters
item.description: Online, people can be anyone just by changing their screen name or using no name at all. Katie Couric comments on the anonymous atom bombs of animosity in comment sections on the internet.
item.itunes:subtitle: Online, people can be anyone just by changing their screen name or using no name at all. Katie Couric comments on the anonymous atom bombs of animosity in comment sections on the internet.

item.title: Notebook: Millenials
item.description: The generation known as the Millenials, people between the ages of 18 and 29, are having a rough time according to figures provided by a new study. Katie Couric comments.
item.itunes:subtitle: The generation known as the Millenials, people between the ages of 18 and 29, are having a rough time according to figures provided by a new study. Katie Couric comments.
